text: Anthony Charles "Tony" Beilenson (October 26, 1932 – March 5, 2017) was an American Democratic Congressman from Southern California. He served ten terms in the United States House of Representatives from 1977 to 1997. Beilenson was born in New Rochelle, New York. He studied at Harvard University. He was Jewish.Stone, Kurt F. "The Jews of Capitol Hill: A Compendium of Jewish Congressional Members, (2011). Pages 320–324. . Beilenson died on March 5, 2017 in Los Angeles, California from a heart attack, aged 84.Anthony Beilenson, 10-term congressman who championed Santa Monica Mountains, dies at 84 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:United States representatives from California Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Politicians from New Rochelle, New York Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Anthony C. Beilenson
